<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get CVEs by Package UUID</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/code/api/v1/vulnerabilities/packages/{packageUuid}/cves"}></MethodEndpoint>



Get cves by package uuid.
